name: Moomintrolls: The Quest for Hobgoblin's Ruby
name_original: Moomintrolls: The Quest for Hobgoblin's Ruby
description:
Moomintrolls: The Quest for Hobgoblin's Ruby is an educational puzzle game developed by Norsk Strek AS. It came out on 01-01-1999. It was published by WSOY. Most rawgers rated the game as "Exceptional".
Moomintrolls: The Quest for Hobgoblin's Ruby is available on PC.
